sequence.name: Welcome Sequence
sequence.goal: Introduce Werkpilot, build trust, qualify lead

emails.preview_text: Ihr erster Schritt zu mehr Sichtbarkeit online
emails.content_brief: Welcome message. Introduce Werkpilot mission. Set expectations for what they'll receive. Include quick-win tip (Google Business Profile check). Warm, personal tone.

emails.subject_a: Die 3 grössten Online-Fehler von {{industry}} in der Schweiz
emails.preview_text: So verlieren KMU täglich potenzielle Kunden
emails.content_brief: Educational email. Top 3 mistakes SMEs make online (no website, no SEO, no reviews). Industry-specific examples. Position Werkpilot as the solution without hard sell.
Case study email. Share a success story relevant to subscriber's industry. Include specific metrics (traffic increase, leads generated). Social proof.

emails.subject_a: Was kostet eine professionelle Online-Präsenz wirklich?
emails.subject_b: {{first_name}}, lassen Sie uns über Investitionen sprechen
emails.content_brief: Value/pricing transparency email. Break down cost of NOT being online vs investment in digital presence. ROI examples. Address common objections. Build urgency without pressure.

emails.preview_text: 15 Minuten, die Ihr Business verändern können
emails.content_brief: Conversion email. Direct CTA to book a call. Summarize what they've learned. Personal tone from founder. Include calendar link. Mention it's free and no-obligation.
